page.title: 15A Lothingland Pupil
page.content: It was Sunday. At last my alarm went off at 8.00. I crept slowly down the stairs, I got my Weetabix and some toast, then I went back upstairs to get dressed. At 9.25 I left my house to catch the coach to Sudbury, Shaun and I sat at the back. We got to Sudbury.Then we had to find the football pitch. This was not easy but luckily for us we saw the Spartans' manager and he directed us. We got the game started and we were winning, when I got the ball, I hit it with my right foot from 25 yards right into the top of the net. At half time the score was 10 goals to us and nil to the other team. In the second half I got 2 more goals to complete my hat trick and put the final total to 23. Then, we went home I went to bed. By Iain Spoor
